title: Dead easy cottage pie
ingredients: ['750g potatoes, peeled and halved', '1 teaspoon coconut oil', '1 large onion, diced', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '250g beef mince (higher fat content the better 15 to 20%)', '4 carrots, diced', '1 celery stick, diced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 KnorrÂ® beef stock pot', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '50ml water', '75g unsalted butter', '25ml cream or milk']
